items.name: changeMode(mode, withoutFocus)
items.description: Change editor's mode to given mode string

params.name: mode
params.description: Editor mode name of want to change

items.name: deleteSelection(start, end)
items.description: Delete the content of selection range

items.name: getCurrentPreviewStyle()
items.description: Get current Markdown editor's preview style

items.name: getEditorElements()
items.description: Get markdown editor, preview, wysiwyg editor DOM elements

items.name: getMinHeight()
items.description: Get minimum height of editor content

examples.code: // Markdown mode const rangeInfo = editor.getRangeInfoOfNode(); console.log(rangeInfo); // { range: [[startLineOffset, startCurorOffset], [endLineOffset, endCurorOffset]], type: 'emph' } // WYSIWYG mode const rangeInfo = editor.getRangeInfoOfNode(); console.log(rangeInfo); // { range: [startCursorOffset, endCursorOffset], type: 'emph' }

items.name: getScrollTop()
items.description: Get scroll position value of editor container

examples.code: // Markdown mode const mdSelection = editor.getSelection(); console.log(mdSelection); // [[startLineOffset, startCurorOffset], [endLineOffset, endCurorOffset]] // WYSIWYG mode const wwSelection = editor.getSelection(); console.log(wwSelection); // [startCursorOffset, endCursorOffset]

returns.description: Returns the range of the selection depending on the editor mode

items.name: isMarkdownMode()
items.description: Return true if current editor mode is Markdown

items.name: isWysiwygMode()
items.description: Return true if current editor mode is WYSIWYG

properties.name: el
properties.description: container element

properties.name: height
properties.description: Editor's height style value. Height is applied as border-box ex) '300px', '100%', 'auto'

properties.name: minHeight
properties.description: Editor's min-height style value in pixel ex) '300px'

properties.name: initialValue
properties.description: Editor's initial value

properties.name: previewStyle
properties.description: Markdown editor's preview style (tab, vertical)

properties.name: previewHighlight
properties.description: Highlight a preview element corresponds to the cursor position in the markdown editor

properties.name: initialEditType
properties.description: Initial editor type (markdown, wysiwyg)

properties.name: events
properties.description: Events

properties.name: load
properties.description: It would be emitted when editor fully load

properties.name: change
properties.description: It would be emitted when content changed

properties.name: caretChange
properties.description: It would be emitted when format change by cursor position

properties.name: focus
properties.description: It would be emitted when editor get focus

properties.name: blur
properties.description: It would be emitted when editor loose focus

properties.name: keydown
properties.description: It would be emitted when the key is pressed in editor

properties.name: keyup
properties.description: It would be emitted when the key is released in editor

properties.name: beforePreviewRender
properties.description: It would be emitted before rendering the markdown preview with html string

properties.name: beforeConvertWysiwygToMarkdown
properties.description: It would be emitted before converting wysiwyg to markdown with markdown text

properties.name: hooks
properties.description: Hooks

properties.name: addImageBlobHook
properties.description: hook for image upload

properties.name: language
properties.description: language

properties.name: useCommandShortcut
properties.description: whether use keyboard shortcuts to perform commands

properties.name: usageStatistics
properties.description: send hostname to google analytics

properties.name: toolbarItems
properties.description: toolbar items.

properties.name: hideModeSwitch
properties.description: hide mode switch tab bar

properties.name: plugins
properties.description: Array of plugins. A plugin can be either a function or an array in the form of function, options.

properties.name: extendedAutolinks
properties.description: Using extended Autolinks specified in GFM spec

properties.name: placeholder
properties.description: The placeholder text of the editable element.

properties.name: linkAttributes
properties.description: Attributes of anchor element that should be rel, target, hreflang, type

properties.name: customHTMLRenderer
properties.description: Object containing custom renderer functions correspond to change markdown node to preview HTML or wysiwyg node

properties.name: customMarkdownRenderer
properties.description: Object containing custom renderer functions correspond to change wysiwyg node to markdown text

properties.name: referenceDefinition
properties.description: whether use the specification of link reference definition

properties.name: customHTMLSanitizer
properties.description: custom HTML sanitizer

properties.name: previewHighlight
properties.description: whether highlight preview area

properties.name: frontMatter
properties.description: whether use the front matter

properties.name: widgetRules
properties.description: The rules for replacing the text with widget node

properties.name: theme
properties.description: The theme to style the editor with. The default is included in toastui-editor.css.

items.name: replaceSelection(text, start, end)
items.description: Replace selection range with given text content

items.name: replaceWithWidget(start, end, text)
items.description: Replace node with widget to range

items.name: setMinHeight(minHeight)
items.description: Set minimum height to editor content

items.name: setPlaceholder(placeholder)
items.description: Set the placeholder on all editors

items.name: setScrollTop(value)
items.description: Move on scroll position of the editor container
